content: 2019 Singaporean romantic comedy film ***When Ghost Meets Zombie*** ([Chinese](/wiki/Chinese_language): 女鬼爱上尸) is a 2019 Singaporean Mandarin-language romantic comedy film directed by Han Yew Kwang. The film tells the story of a male zombie who is forced by a female ghost to join a male pageant competition, in order to fulfil her own pageant dreams. It is released on 14 February 2019 in Singapore, and 18 April 2019 in Malaysia. The film stars [Nathan Hartono](/wiki/Nathan_Hartono) and [Ferlyn Wong](/wiki/Ferlyn_Wong), both playing their first lead roles in their careers. ## Synopsis The film tells the story of a male zombie named Pong who becomes a mechanical and aimless zombie. One day, he meets a free-spirited female ghost named Zhen Zhen. Hilarious drama unfolds when Zhen Zhen possesses Pong to realise her dream of winning a beauty pageant and forces him to join the male pageant competition. ## Cast - [Nathan Hartono](/wiki/Nathan_Hartono) as Pong - [Ferlyn Wong](/wiki/Ferlyn_Wong) as Zhen Zhen - [Fann Wong](/wiki/Fann_Wong) as Meng Na - [Jesseca Liu](/wiki/Jesseca_Liu) as Bai Bai - [Jeremy Chan](/wiki/Jeremy_Chan) as Lai Lai - [Gurmit Singh](/wiki/Gurmit_Singh) as Priest - [Andie Chen](/wiki/Andie_Chen) as Xiao Liang - [Kate Pang](/wiki/Kate_Pang) as Joe - [Suhaimi Yusof](/wiki/Suhaimi_Yusof) as Boat Man - [Yvonne Lim](/wiki/Yvonne_Lim) as Judge - [Dennis Chew](/wiki/Dennis_Chew) as Hell Manager - [Jack Neo](/wiki/Jack_Neo) as "Mr Perfect" audition judge - [Shaun Chen](/wiki/Shaun_Chen) as "Mr Perfect" audition judge - [Chen Tianwen](/wiki/Chen_Tianwen) as Village Head - [Zheng Geping](/wiki/Zheng_Geping) as Gym Trainer - [Lee Teng](/wiki/Lee_Teng_(actor)) as Host ## Music The official theme song, "等" (lit.
